trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around April 15th 2003
Summary: observed circular object coming out of clouds
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving along us231. The clouds looked funny at the time and I observed an oject coming out of the odd looking clouds. At first I thought it was an airplane until it got close, than it descended very fast which isn't usual for an aircraft, or not that I've ever seen. That is when I noticed that it was circular in shape and I could see the center was a lazer red light. It was rocking side to side and didn't like a smooth descent. It came down into a smalled wooded are which was about 50-6- yard wide with small trees and dense under growth. I turned onto the road of the wooded area and I didn't observe the object after that. At the time as I watched it rocking back and forth I felt like it was having mechanical problems.
